Name: esterification of vegetable oils and animal fats, average mix | fatty acid methyl ester | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/19:Manufacture of coke and refined petroleum products/192:Manufacture of refined petroleum products/1920:Manufacture of refined petroleum products
Description: Typical vegetable oil esterification plant designed for the production of methyl ester (for use in the vehicle fuels market). All producers report using the methylic production route with base catalysers (i.e. sodium hydroxide and sodium methoxide).
